hero.title: Trusted Medical Equipment Manufacturer in Indonesia
hero.description: PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia produces and supplies reliable medical devices for hospitals, clinics, and laboratories throughout Indonesia.
hero.tagline: Supporting safe and quality health services

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Quality medical equipment for your needs

implants.title: Orthopedic Bone Implants
implants.description: High-quality bone implants for fixing fractures and bone damage due to disease. Developed based on research from the Faculty of Engineering and Medicine UGM.

prosthetics.title: Prosthetic & Orthotic Devices
prosthetics.description: High-quality prosthetic and orthotic solutions to help patient mobility and quality of life. Developed with the latest technology and comfortable materials.

about.title: About PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia
about.subtitle: Trusted Medical Equipment Manufacturer
about.description: PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia is a leading medical equipment manufacturing and distribution company in Indonesia with over 15 years of experience in the medical industry.
about.mission: We are committed to providing high-quality medical equipment that meets international standards and Indonesian health regulations.
about.commitment: With an experienced team and a wide distribution network, we are ready to support healthcare facilities throughout Indonesia in providing the best service to the community.

solutions.title: Solutions for Every Need
solutions.subtitle: Our products are used in various health service environments
solutions.hospitalDesc: We provide complete solutions for hospitals, from operating room equipment, ICU, to inpatient furniture. Our products are designed to support operational efficiency and patient comfort.
solutions.clinicDesc: For clinics and medical practices, we offer diagnostic equipment, examination tools, and medical furniture that are compact yet high-quality for limited spaces.
solutions.labDesc: Clinical and research laboratories can rely on our precision instruments for sample analysis, testing, and various laboratory procedures with accurate and consistent results.

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Latest information from PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia

items.title: UGM Develops Bone Plates Sized for Indonesians
items.excerpt: Bone fixation plates tailored to Indonesian anatomy to improve reconstruction outcomes and healing quality.

items.title: UGM Pioneers Knee Joint Implants Sized for Indonesians
items.excerpt: CT-based knee and hip measurements at RS UGM guide prosthesis design that matches Indonesian morphometry.

items.title: Innovation & Innovators Expo by Kemenristekdikti
items.excerpt: i3E 2015 agreement to accelerate research downstreaming and technology adoption for villages and remote areas.

items.title: CIMEDs UGM Donates Implants for Palu Quake Victims
items.excerpt: CIMEDs FT UGM team delivers 100 bone-fixation implants to support treatment of earthquake and tsunami patients in Palu and Donggala.

items.title: Ontiyus Achieves ISO 13485 Certification
items.excerpt: ISO 13485:2016 certifies international-quality standards from design to distribution of medical devices.

books.title: Publications & Books
books.subtitle: Collection of engineering and medical research books from experts
books.author: By:

items.title: Engineering Materials for Engineers (Ferrous Metals)
items.description: Comprehensive book on ferrous metal materials for engineering applications. Covers structure, mechanical properties, and practical applications in manufacturing and healthcare industries.

items.title: Engineering Materials for Engineers (Non-Ferrous Metals)
items.description: Complete guide on non-ferrous metal materials including aluminum, copper, and their alloys. Ideal for engineering students and industry professionals.

items.title: Engineering Materials for Engineers (Polymers, Ceramics, Wood and Composites)
items.description: In-depth exploration of non-metallic materials including polymers, ceramics, wood and modern composite materials. Applications in medical industry and research.

gallery.title: Gallery & Portfolio
gallery.subtitle: See our production facilities, products, and collaborations

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Contact Us
contact.description: We are ready to help you. Please contact us for questions about products, partnerships, technical support, or other information about PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia services.
contact.formDesc: Fill in the form below and our team will contact you within 1-2 business days.
contact.name: Full Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.submittedDesc: Thank you for contacting us. Our team will respond to your message soon.
contact.contactInfoDesc: You can also contact us directly through the information below.
contact.faqDesc: Some frequently asked questions about our products and services.
contact.q1: How do I order products from PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia?
contact.a1: You can contact our sales team via WhatsApp at 081225716870, email to ontiyuskaryamulia@gmail.com, or call (0274) 2887324. Our team will help you with product catalogs and ordering process.
contact.q2: Is after-sales service and product warranty available?
contact.a2: Yes, all our products come with warranty and after-sales service. Warranty details vary depending on product type. Our team is ready to provide the technical support needed.
contact.q3: Does Ontiyus provide custom medical device manufacturing?
contact.a3: Yes, we provide engineering services and custom medical component manufacturing. As a spin-off from UGM research, we have expertise in developing implants and prosthetics according to specific needs.
contact.a4: We serve delivery throughout Indonesia. Our office and workshop are located in Sleman, Yogyakarta. For areas outside Java, we work with trusted logistics partners.

partners.title: Partners & Certifications
partners.subtitle: Trusted by various hospitals and health facilities

kemenkes.name: MINISTRY OF HEALTH RI
kemenkes.description: Distribution Permit from Ministry of Health

footer.description: PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia is a medical equipment manufacturing and research tools company. We are committed to providing quality products to support healthcare and education services in Indonesia.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: About Us
hero.description: PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia is a spin-off research company from UGM that focuses on manufacturing and distributing orthopedic bone implants and prostheses. We have been serving since 2020 to support orthopedic healthcare services in Indonesia.

history.title: Company History
history.p1: Ontiyus Karya Mulia is a limited liability company. The company was established on February 25, 2020 in Yogyakarta based on the Notary Deed of Erry Aryanto SH, M.Si.
history.p2: The establishment of this company has been ratified based on the Decree of the Minister of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia No. C-45.HT.03.02. Year 2006.
history.p3: This company produces medical devices, especially equipment related to assistive devices to repair bone damage due to fractures or damage due to a disease.
history.p4: This company is a "spin-off" from research conducted by several researchers at the Faculty of Engineering and Faculty of Medicine, Gadjah Mada University.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: Vision
vision.content: To become an industrial partner in meeting the needs of medical device products and innovation in the field of manufacturing for the Indonesian people.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: Mission
mission.item1: Meet the needs for quality and affordable domestic medical devices.
mission.item2: Meet the demands for production of innovative products according to community needs.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Commitment to high quality standards in every product we produce.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously innovate to develop better healthcare solutions.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Conducting business with honesty and transparency to all parties.

care.title: Care
care.description: Caring about the community's need for quality healthcare services.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Our Expertise
expertise.description: With an experienced team from UGM and modern production facilities, we have expertise in various fields of medical device development.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Our Journey
timeline.description: Important milestones in the journey of PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia building the Indonesian medical equipment industry.

milestones.title: Company Establishment
milestones.description: PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia was established on February 25, 2020 in Yogyakarta based on Notary Deed of Erry Aryanto SH, M.Si.

milestones.title: Early Research at UGM
milestones.description: Prosthetic and implant research initiated by CIMEDs team at Faculty of Engineering and Faculty of Medicine, Gadjah Mada University.

milestones.title: Palu Earthquake Relief
milestones.description: Donation of 100 implants created by Dr. Suyitno and CIMEDs research group for Palu earthquake victims, Central Sulawesi.

milestones.title: Certification & Standardization
milestones.description: Obtained national standard certification for medical device production and strengthened quality control system.

milestones.title: Prosthesis Product Line Expansion
milestones.description: Expanded product portfolio to leg and hand prostheses to meet rehabilitation needs of Indonesian society.

milestones.title: National Partnership
milestones.description: Established partnerships with various hospitals and clinics throughout Indonesia for wider distribution.

expertiseItems.title: Orthopedic Bone Implants
expertiseItems.description: Expertise in designing and manufacturing bone implants for fracture repair.

expertiseItems.title: Academic Collaboration
expertiseItems.description: Partnership with Gadjah Mada University for research and development.

hero.title: Product Catalog
hero.subtitle: Product Catalog

categories.implantsDesc: High-quality bone implants for repairing fractures and bone damage due to disease. Developed based on research from the Faculty of Engineering and Medicine UGM.
categories.prostheticsDesc: High-quality leg and hand prostheses to help patient mobility. Developed with the latest technology and comfortable materials.
categories.hospitalDesc: Medical equipment for hospitals ranging from patient beds, diagnostic tools, to other medical furniture.
categories.labDesc: Precision laboratory instruments for sample analysis, testing, and various laboratory procedures.
categories.customSolutionsDesc: We provide engineering services and custom medical component manufacturing according to your specific needs.

hero.title: Our Solutions
hero.subtitle: Our Solutions
hero.description: Comprehensive solutions for various healthcare needs, from hospitals to educational institutions.

hospital.title: Hospital
hospital.subtitle: Hospital Solutions
hospital.description: Complete solutions for hospitals from diagnostic equipment to medical furniture that meets international standards.
hospital.longDescription: PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia provides comprehensive solutions for hospitals throughout Indonesia. We understand the complex needs of modern hospitals that require high-quality, reliable, and efficient equipment to support various departments from emergency rooms, ICU, operating rooms, to inpatient care.
hospital.benefit1Desc: Patient monitors, ECG, ultrasound, and modern diagnostic equipment for accurate diagnosis.
hospital.benefit2Desc: Electric beds, operating tables, stretchers, and quality medical furniture.
hospital.benefit3Desc: Prosthetic solutions for patients requiring mobility rehabilitation.
hospital.benefit4Desc: Our technical team is ready to provide training and after-sales support.

clinic.title: Clinic & Medical Practice
clinic.subtitle: Clinic & Medical Practice
clinic.description: Efficient solutions for clinics and medical practices with limited space but still requiring quality equipment.
clinic.longDescription: Clinics and medical practices require compact yet high-quality solutions. PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia provides medical equipment specially designed for limited spaces with maximum functionality.
clinic.benefit1Desc: Examination and diagnostic tools that save space but remain accurate.
clinic.benefit2Desc: Examination beds, medical chairs, and space-saving furniture.
clinic.benefit3Desc: Economical solutions without sacrificing quality for small medical practices.
clinic.benefit4Desc: Equipment designed for quick and easy installation.

education.title: Education & Research Institutions
education.subtitle: Education & Research Institutions
education.description: Equipment for medical education, research laboratories, and medical training programs.
education.longDescription: Educational and research institutions require equipment that is not only quality but also supports the learning and research process. We provide special solutions for universities, medical schools, and research centers.
education.benefit1Desc: Precision instruments for practicum and medical student research.
education.benefit2Desc: Teaching aids and simulators for effective medical learning.
education.benefit3Desc: Research collaboration and development of innovative products with academics.
education.benefit4Desc: Workshops and training on the use of medical devices for students and lecturers.

rehabilitation.title: Rehabilitation Centers
rehabilitation.subtitle: Rehabilitation Centers
rehabilitation.description: Prostheses and mobility aids for rehabilitation centers and physical therapy.
rehabilitation.longDescription: Rehabilitation centers require prostheses and assistive devices that support patient recovery. PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia provides high-quality prostheses that are comfortable and support the rehabilitation process.
rehabilitation.benefit1Desc: Quality leg prostheses to help patients walk again.
rehabilitation.benefit2Desc: Functional hand prostheses for daily activities.
rehabilitation.benefit3Desc: Measurement and adjustment services for prostheses according to patient anatomy.
rehabilitation.benefit4Desc: Therapist assistance in using prostheses and rehabilitation exercises.

hero.title: News & Activities
hero.subtitle: News & Activities
hero.description: Latest information about activities, achievements, and developments of PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia in supporting the Indonesian medical equipment industry.

articles.title: UGM Provides Bone Implants for Palu Earthquake Victims
articles.excerpt: Donation of 100 implants created by Dr. Suyitno and CIMEDs research group for Palu earthquake victims, Central Sulawesi.

articles.title: UGM Pioneering Knee Joint Implants Sized for Indonesians
articles.excerpt: Research to obtain the size and shape of knee and hip joints is currently underway at UGM Hospital.

articles.title: Innovation & Innovator Expo by Ministry of Research, Technology and Higher Education
articles.excerpt: Minister of Research, Technology and Higher Education (Menristekdikti) signed a memorandum of understanding for Indonesia Innovations & Innovators Expo (i3E) 2015.

articles.title: Collaboration with UGM for Development of Next Generation Prosthetics
articles.excerpt: PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia signed MoU with Gadjah Mada University for development of more innovative prosthetic technology.

articles.title: Ontiyus Obtains ISO 13485 Certification for Quality Management System
articles.excerpt: Important achievement in commitment to quality production of medical devices according to international standards.

hero.title: Publications & Books
hero.subtitle: Publications & Books
hero.description: Collection of engineering and medical research books written by experts in their fields. These books cover topics in engineering materials, biomaterials, and engineering to support education and research.

booksPage.aboutDesc1: Our books are written by experts in the field of material engineering with decades of experience in research and development. Each publication includes in-depth theory and practical applications relevant to the medical and manufacturing industries.
booksPage.aboutDesc2: These publications are the result of collaboration between PT. Ontiyus Karya Mulia and Gadjah Mada University, particularly the Faculty of Engineering and the CIMEDs research team. All books are available through official publishers and can be ordered directly through our website.
booksPage.bulkOrderHelp: Contact us for information on bulk orders or direct hard copy purchases

cta.needMoreInfoDesc: Our team is ready to help you find the right medical equipment solution for your healthcare facility needs.
cta.consultYourNeedsDesc: Our expert team is ready to help you find the right medical equipment solution according to your healthcare facility's needs and budget.
